name: brandeval
description: AI-powered brand name evaluation - check domains, social handles, trademarks, pronunciation, and brand perception

skills.name: evaluate-brand
skills.description: Evaluate a brand name for availability, pronunciation, international appeal, and AI-powered perception analysis. Use this when the user wants to evaluate potential brand names, company names, or product names.

skills.name: generate-names
skills.description: Generate brand name candidates based on company mission, values, and target market. Use this when the user needs help brainstorming brand name ideas.

skills.name: compare-names
skills.description: Compare multiple brand name candidates side-by-side across all evaluation criteria. Use this when the user has several name options and wants to choose the best one.
